Prince of Pico #TweetTweetJam

My 5th annual #TweetTweetJam entry is: Prince of Pico !
An attempt to remake the classic "Prince of Persia" game, by Jordan Mechner  in PICO-8, but in just 560 chars, using NO art assets! 😅

CONTROLS
  • Walk   = ◀ /  ▶
  • Jump = 🔼
GAME
  • Explore a 3D(ish), Procedurally-generated Dungeon ⛓
  • Unlock gates using floor triggers to advance 🚪
  • Jump around with realistic* physics and collision 👀
  • ...That's about it! 😅
    Alas, while I got a full platformer, with generated map + sprites in just 560 chars - I didn't have space to add what I wanted (lose life, sword, enemies, traps)
